concept.title: Full concept details
concept.description: Return the full details about a concept

_id.description: The unique identifier (name) for this concept

_created.description: The (unix timestamp) date value on which this concept was created

_shadow.description: Indicates cases when the concept is only referred to and not explicitly defined.

annotations.description: The annotations that apply to this concept.

instance_count.description: The total number of instances of this concept

primary_sentence_count.description: The number of primary sentences that define this concept

secondary_sentence_count.description: The number of secondary sentences that refer to this concept

icon.description: The filename of the image that should be used to graphically render this concept

direct_parents.description: A list of the concepts that are the direct parents of this concept

direct_parent_names.description: A list of the names of the concepts that are the direct parents of this concept

all_parent_names.description: A list of the names of the concepts that are the parents of this concept

direct_children.description: A list of the concepts that are the direct children of this concept

direct_child_names.description: A list of the names of the concepts that are the direct children of this concept

all_child_names.description: A list of the names of the concepts that are the children of this concept

direct_properties.description: A list of the properties that are defined directly against this concept

inherited_properties.description: A list of the properties that are inherited from parent concepts

conceptual_models.description: A list of conceptual models in which this concept is defined.

primary_sentences.description: A list of primary sentences that define this concept

secondary_sentences.description: A list of secondary sentences that refer to this concept

meta_instance.description: The automatically created meta-model instance that corresponds to this concept.
